Dialogue.Page: This platform showcases the winners of the modding community’s fifth mod jam, held in July of 2025 with the theme of “Miniature”.
This jam had a special restriction, modders were required to make a small star system that is no bigger than 2500 meters in radius, all of which were in one shared system.
Much like Jam 3, this allowed for a more connected experience, and allowed all the modders to do some rich worldbuilding for the once lonely Nomai Vessel in the center.
If you want to, you can meet the creators of these mods at the party on the north pole!
